description: The screen flickers and the app becomes unusable quickly.

I was excited to try this out, but when I selected Chicago, USA as a provider and searched for Union Station (which has train, light rail, and bus routes going through it) it was unable to find it. So in other words, the application is not usable. It also only had a handful of major cities, but that's inconsequential when even what's there is non-functional.
Es fehlen noch von Dtrasse eingeben zur haltestelle und dann haltestelle die Daten,also im klartext ausbaufähig alles
